meanings.sent1: The exciting episode of the birthday party made everyone happy.
meanings.sent2: I watched an episode of my favorite cartoon last night.
meanings.sent3: The episode of the dog chasing its tail was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The episode of the thunderstorm was like nature's symphony.
meanings.sent5: The episode of the magician's disappearing act was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A part of a series of events or a story.
meanings.sent1: Each episode of the TV show reveals more about the characters.
meanings.sent2: The final episode of the season left us on a cliffhanger.
meanings.sent3: The episode of the cat trying to catch a laser pointer was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The episode of the sun setting over the ocean was a breathtaking scene.
meanings.sent5: The episode of the detective solving the mystery was truly captivating.
